Pre-Game Insights: Portugal may rest Cristiano Ronaldo with Goncalo Ramos potentially starting up front.
Rafael Leao's unavailability means a fringe attacker like Joao Felix or Pedro Neto could start.
Diogo Costa is expected to remain in goal, while Nuno Mendes is out and Nelson Semedo may take his place.
Francisco Conceicao is one yellow card away from suspension, as is Joao Palhinha.
Manchester United's Bruno Fernandes and Manchester City's Bernardo Silva are expected to start.
